Name: Peanut Butter
Description: The classic staple. Do you like smooth or crunchy?

DescriptionLocalization.es: El añadido clásico. ¿Te gusta suave o crujiente?
DescriptionLocalization.de: Der Klassiker. Mit Stückchen, für Feinere benötigst du eine Mühle.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: La denrée de base. Vous l'aimez doux ou croquant ?
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 定番の調味料。なめらかなタイプと砕いた粒が残ってるタイプ、どちらがお好み？
DescriptionLocalization.pt: The classic staple. Do you like smooth or crunchy?
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Классический продукт. Вам нравится гладкий или хрустящий?
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Olmazsa olmaz. Gevrek mi yumuşak mı seversin?
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 花生酱。经典的主食。你喜欢粘稠的还是里面带点脆脆的花生的？
